dialogues.name: Takeshi
dialogues.dialogueText: Why is my life so damn difficult.

dialogues.name: Lucci
dialogues.dialogueText: You really are my chosen one.

dialogues.name: Takeshi
dialogues.dialogueText: I really doubt that I am...

dialogues.name: Lucci
dialogues.dialogueText: Believe me I could tell when I first saw you.

dialogues.name: Rob
dialogues.dialogueText: Takeshi cannot be your destined one when he must save the future from the robots
